title: How should we feel when wearing new clothes? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: muhammad from the philippines he says what should i feel when i'm wearing new clothes you should feel happy you should feel blessed because this is from allah azzawajal and definitely you should not feel arrogant or better than others who were deprived from such anima so whenever i wear something that is new i praise allah azzawajal for granting it to me and favoring me with it and i feel humbled by allah's favor and blessing i don't feel arrogant or better than others who don't share what i have and this is showing your gratitude to allah through that insha allah
